translations: v．根除，消灭：彻底消除或摧毁某物，使其不再存在。

sentences.sentence: Eradicates the money worship, sets up the correct benefit view.
sentences.translation: 破除金钱崇拜，树立正确的利益观。

sentences.sentence: When our body tries to repair, it also eradicates the cold virus.
sentences.translation: 当身体去修复时，也把感冒病毒给消灭了。

sentences.sentence: It eradicates anaerobic bacteria and consequently washes them off your lips.
sentences.translation: 它根除厌氧细菌，因此洗涤赶走你的嘴唇。
